sentence.Network_en: Both offer excellent value at around £90 for a double room.

phrase.cizu_name: on the double 或 at the double

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin duplus (see duple). The verb is from Old French dobler, from late Latin duplare, from duplus

encyclopedia.content: 单词 形容词a. [Z] 1.两倍的；加倍的 2.双的；成双的；双层的 3.两人用的，双人的 副词ad. 1.双倍地；加倍地 2.双重地 名词n. 1.两倍锛埵蛄匡級,加倍[C][U] 2.酷似的人[C] 3.替角演员；替身[C] 及物动词vt. 1.使加倍；是。..的两倍 2.把。..对折[(+back/over)];握紧锛埲凤級 不及物动词vi. 1.变成两倍；增加一倍double数据类型 Double（双精度浮点型）是计算机使用的一种资料型别。比起单精度浮点数(float)，Double(双精度浮

entry.def: You use double to indicate that something includes or is made of two things of the same kind.

example.ex: ...a pair of double doors into the room from the new entrance hall.
example.tran: 从新的门厅通向该房间的一对双开门

example.ex: ...a lone skier gliding along smooth double tracks.
example.tran: 独自沿平滑的双轨雪道滑行的滑雪者

entry.tran: (用于单数名词前)两个的，双重的
entry.def: You use double before a singular noun to refer to two things of the same type that occur together, or that are connected in some way.

example.ex: ...an extremely nasty double murder...
example.tran: 极端残忍的双重谋杀

example.ex: The government committed a double blunder...
example.tran: 政府重蹈覆辙。

entry.def: If something is double the amount or size of another thing, it is twice as large.

example.ex: The offer was to start a new research laboratory at double the salary he was then getting...
example.tran: 所提供的工作机会是创建一个新的研究实验室，待遇是他当时所得工资的两倍。

example.ex: Leeds Prison is reported to have almost double the number of prisoners it's designed to accommodate.
example.tran: 据报道利兹监狱里犯人的数量几乎已达该监狱设计可容纳人数的两倍了。

entry.tran: 加倍的;双料的;可容纳两个的
entry.def: You use double to describe something which is twice the normal size or can hold twice the normal quantity of something.

example.ex: ...a double helping of ice cream.
example.tran: 双份的冰激凌

example.ex: ...a large double garage...
example.tran: 能停放两辆车的大车库

entry.def: A double room is a room intended for two people, usually a couple, to stay or live in.

example.ex: ...bed and breakfast for £180 for two people in a double room.
example.tran: 费用为180英镑的双人间，含房费和早餐

entry.def: A double bed is a bed that is wide enough for two people to sleep in.
You use double to describe a drink that is twice the normal measure.

example.ex: He was drinking his double whiskey too fast and scowling.
example.tran: 他猛灌着双份威士忌，脸色阴沉。

entry.tran: (用于单词拼写或数字中)两个的
entry.def: Double is used when you are spelling a word or telling someone a number to show that a letter or digit is repeated.

example.ex: Ring four two double two double two if you'd like to speak to our financial adviser.
example.tran: 如果想和我们的财务顾问通话，拨打 422222。

entry.def: When something doubles or when you double it, it becomes twice as great in number, amount, or size.

example.ex: The number of managers must double to 100 within 3 years...
example.tran: 经理的人数在3年内必须翻倍达到 100人。

example.ex: The program will double the amount of money available to help pay for child care.
example.tran: 该方案将使可用于帮助支付儿童保育的钱款增加一倍。

entry.def: If you refer to someone as a person's double, you mean that they look exactly like them.

example.ex: Your mother sees you as her double.
example.tran: 你母亲将你看作是她的翻版。

entry.def: If a person or thing doubles as someone or something else, they have a second job or purpose as well as their main one.

example.ex: ...a farmer who doubles as a night nurse...
example.tran: 兼做夜班护士的农夫

example.ex: Lots of homes in town double as businesses.
example.tran: 镇里的很多民宅还兼做商用。

entry.def: In tennis or badminton, when people play doubles, two teams consisting of two players on each team play against each other on the same court.
If you do something at the double or on the double, you do it very quickly or immediately.

example.ex: Two soldiers entered at the double and saluted...
example.tran: 两名士兵立即进来敬礼。

example.ex: Come to my office, please, at the double.
example.tran: 请来我的办公室，马上。

entry.def: When you bend double, you bend the top half of your body downwards a long way.

example.ex: There wasn't room to stand up and he had to bend double.
example.tran: 空间太小无法站直，他不得不弓着身子。

entry.def: If you are bent double, the top half of your body is bent downwards so that your head is close to your knees.

example.ex: Pickers are bent double, plucking each flower with lightning speed.
example.tran: 采花人弓着身子飞快地摘着花。

entry.def: If you are seeing double, there is something wrong with your eyes, and you can see two images instead of one.

example.ex: I was dizzy, seeing double.
example.tran: 我一阵眩晕，看到的都是重影。

means.word_mean: 1. a base hit on which the batter stops safely at second base;

sentences.sentence: "he hit a double to deep centerfield"

means.word_mean: 2. a stand-in for movie stars to perform dangerous stunts;

sentences.sentence: "his first job in Hollywood was as a double for Clark Gable"

means.word_mean: 3. someone who closely resembles a famous person (especially an actor);

sentences.sentence: "she's the very image of her mother"

means.word_mean: 4. a quantity that is twice as great as another;
5. raising the stakes in a card game by a factor of 2;

sentences.sentence: "I decided his double was a bluff"

means.word_mean: 3. bend over or curl up, usually with laughter or pain;
4. do double duty; serve two purposes or have two functions;

sentences.sentence: "She doubles as his wife and secretary"

means.word_mean: 5. bridge: make a demand for (a card or suit)
6. make or do or perform again;

sentences.sentence: "He could never replicate his brilliant performance of the magic trick"

means.word_mean: 1. having more than one decidedly dissimilar aspects or qualities;

sentences.sentence: "a double (or dual) role for an actor"
"the office of a clergyman is twofold; public preaching and private influence"- R.W.Emerson
"every episode has its double and treble meaning"-Frederick Harrison

means.word_mean: 2. consisting of or involving two parts or components usually in pairs;

sentences.sentence: "duple (or double) time consists of two (or a multiple of two) beats to a measure"

means.word_mean: 4. used of flowers having more than the usual number of petals in crowded or overlapping arrangements;

sentences.sentence: "double chrysanthemums have many rows of petals and are usually spherical or hemispherical"

means.word_mean: 5. used of homologous chromosomes associated in pairs in synapsis
7. having two meanings with intent to deceive;

Sentence.sentence: With the percentage of people over age 65 expected to nearly double by 2050, it's important to weigh the health benefits of screening against the risks and costs of routine testing.
It projected that the number would double by 2030.
Underling all this growth will be the demand for energy, which is expected to double over the next 40 years.
By last year, Wall Street traders, bankers and those who deal in real estate generated 21% of the national income, double their share in the 1950s.
Water Usage: Over the past century, human use of fresh water has increased at more than double the rate of population growth.

sentences.en: The total output is double that of last year.

means.word_mean: 供两人用的, 双人的

sentences.en: We don't like the man who bears a double face.
sentences.cn: 我们不喜欢不诚实的人。

sentences.en: Ten is the double of five.
She doubled the sheet of the paper and put it away.
sentences.cn: 她把这张纸折起来放到一边。

sentences.en: The house has doubled in value since I bought it.
sentences.cn: 自从我买下这幢房子以来, 它的价值已增加了一倍。

sentences.en: The baby doubled its weight in a year.
sentences.cn: 那婴儿一年中体重增加了一倍。

sentences.en: He is doubling the parts of a preacher and a teacher.
sentences.cn: 他扮演牧师和教师两个角色。

sentences.en: He suddenly doubled and ran in the opposite direction.
sentences.cn: 他突然转身, 朝相反方向跑去。

jushi.english: The man will be given double pay if he wants to work on Sundays.
jushi.chinese: 如果他想星期天工作,那他就会得双倍的工资。
